bug.author: zhenghuiwang
bug.summary: Katib UI and Metadata UI doesn't work under basic auth mode
bug.description:
/kind bug What steps did you take and what happened: I deployed KF v0.6.1 using basic auth. The Katib and metadata UI don't work. You can see this error message in the central dashboard <denchmark-code>/metadata is not a valid page. </denchmark-code>
But pipeline and notebook UI work. Environment:
Kubeflow version: v0.6.1 kfctl version: (use kfctl version): v0.6.1 Kubernetes platform: (e.g. minikube) GCP
